mosinstall.name: Featured EZ Autos Vehicle Listing
mosinstall.author: K.J. Strickland
mosinstall.description: This module shows details of a featured EZ Autos Vehicle listing.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: horizspace
param.label: Horizontal Space (px)
param.description: Horizontal space between image and wrapped text (default is 10)

param.name: vertspace
param.label: Vertical Space (px)
param.description: Vertical space between image and wrapped text (default is 10)

param.name: width
param.label: Image Width (px)
param.description: Width to resize image to (default is 200 pixels wide)

param.name: slimbox4
param.label: Type of Image Display
param.description: Select what sort of image system to use with the previews

param.name: popwidth1
param.label: Popup Image Width (px)
param.description: Width to resize popup image to (default is 400 pixels wide)
